title: Add 6 new games: Fortnite, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Minecraft, FIFA 26, Geometry Dash

requirements.text: Add six new game cards to the GameLibrary section: Fortnite, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Minecraft, FIFA 26, and Geometry Dash. Each card must follow the existing GameCard component pattern with a thumbnail, genre badge, title, short description, and 'Play Now' button styled with the neon arcade theme.

quotes: Can you add Fortnite and brawl stars and clash of clans also Minecraft ohh and fifa 26 and last but not least geometry dash

acceptanceCriteria: Six new game cards appear in the GameLibrary grid alongside the existing four
Each new card displays a title, short description, genre badge, and 'Play Now' button
Cards are styled consistently with the existing neon arcade theme
The grid layout accommodates the expanded set of cards responsively

requirements.text: Add iframe embed play pages for the six new games using these URLs: Fortnite — https://www.xbox.com/en-US/play/games/fortnite/BT5P2X999VH2, Brawl Stars — https://brawlstars.com, Clash of Clans — https://clashofclans.com, Minecraft — https://classic.minecraft.net, FIFA 26 — https://www.ea.com/games/ea-sports-fc/fc-26, Geometry Dash — https://geometrydash.io. Each game must have a dedicated route at /play/$gameId that embeds the game in a full-width iframe, consistent with the existing GamePlayPage pattern.

quotes: Can you add Fortnite and brawl stars and clash of clans also Minecraft ohh and fifa 26 and last but not least geometry dash

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Play Now' on any of the six new game cards navigates to /play/$gameId
Each game page renders a full-width iframe with the correct URL
The play page toolbar shows the game name and a back/external link option
All six new game routes work without breaking existing game routes

requirements.text: Update the Header and Footer components to reflect the expanded game count (now 10 games total). The game count badge in the Header and the game list in the Footer should include all ten games.
acceptanceCriteria: Header game count badge displays 10 instead of 4
Footer game list includes all ten games
No visual regressions in the header or footer layout

constraints: Preserve all existing game cards and their iframe URLs without modification
All new components must follow the existing neon arcade theme defined in index.css and tailwind.config.js
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/main.tsx
nonGoals: Adding search or filter functionality to the game library
Backend changes — all game data remains frontend-only
User accounts, favorites, or any personalization features
